Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
Game contains all the methods that implements the match and all objects that models the game.
Since:
1.0

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static int
    MOVES
    MOVES indicates how many students, player can move in action phase, is 3 or 4 based on the number of the players in the match.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game()
     
    Game(int numberOfPlayers)
    assigns the moves of the students in the action phase via moves according to how many players there are and creates the 4 decks

    setupGame()
    sets all the initial setup of the game: Creates 12 islands adds randomly mother nature on the island adds two students of each color on the islands except the island with mother nature and its opposite fills the students bag with 120 students creates and fills with 3 or 4 students the cloud cards assigns the tower to the players moves the students from the student's bag to the hall extracts randomly 3 special cards assigns the tower to the players

      Parameters:

    • moveStudentsToHall

      public void moveStudentsToHall()
      Moves students from studentsBag to players' hall.

    • setupGame

      public void setupGame()
      sets all the initial setup of the game:
      • Creates 12 islands
      • adds randomly mother nature on the island
      • adds two students of each color on the islands except the island with mother nature and its opposite
      • fills the students bag with 120 students
      • creates and fills with 3 or 4 students the cloud cards
      • assigns the tower to the players
      • moves the students from the student's bag to the hall
      • extracts randomly 3 special cards
      • assigns the tower to the players

    • sendIslands

      public String sendIslands()
      Sends to client a JSON formatted string with the status of the island in game.
      Returns:
      a JSON formatted as a string.

    • createIslands

      public void createIslands()
      Adds to the arrayList islands, all the islands equals to the number of islands (12)

    • addMotherNatureToIsland

      public void addMotherNatureToIsland()
      adds Mother Nature to a random Island, at the beginning of a new match

    • addStudentToIsland

      public void addStudentToIsland()
      adds two students of each color on every island(except the island where there is Mother Nature and its opposite)

    • moveMN

      public boolean moveMN(Player player, int destinationIslandIndex)
      Moves Mother Nature from an island to the destination island.
      Parameters:
      player - is who is playing.
      destinationIslandIndex - is the index of the motherNature's destination island.
      Returns:
      true or false, respectively if mother nature can be moved to the selected destination island or not.

    • getStudentsInBag

      public int getStudentsInBag()

    • extractSpecialCard

      public void extractSpecialCard()
      extract the special cards

    • connectIsland

      public void connectIsland()
      checks if two or more island have the same owner and in that case it unifies the islands into only one

    • assignTeacher

      public void assignTeacher()
      assigns the teacher to a teacher table of the player who has more students of a color in his classroom

    • assignTower

      public void assignTower()
      Assigns the towers to each player at the beginning of a match.

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public void setCurrentPlayer(Player currentPlayer)

    • calculateCurrentPlayer

      public void calculateCurrentPlayer()
      calculate the player who have to play, based on his order of game. Then it notifies to the actual player that his turn is started

    • nextPhase

      public void nextPhase()
      Set up a new phase, check if all players have played and move from planning to action phase.

      Whenever a phase changes, set the current player and check if there are no more students in the student's bag. Checks if it is the lastRound and calculates the winner if it is.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()

    • getIslandWithMN

      public Island getIslandWithMN()
      Returns:
      the Island with mn.

    • getIslandWithMNIndex

      public int getIslandWithMNIndex()
      Returns:
      the index of the island with mn.

    • chooseCloudCard

      public void chooseCloudCard(int indexCloudCard, Player player)
      player chooses a cloud card, if the choice is successful the students are transferred from the cloud card to the player's hall.
      Parameters:
      indexCloudCard - is the cloud card chosen
      player - is who is playing

    • chooseDeck

      public void chooseDeck(int deckNumber, Player player)
      set the deck to the player according to his choice
      Parameters:
      deckNumber - is the identifier of the deck
      player - is who are choosing the deck

    • playAssistantCard

      public boolean playAssistantCard(Player player, int cardNumber)
      Plays the selected assistant card. Check if the selected card is valid, send an error message to the client if an error occur. If the last card in the deck has been played flags true the lastRound variable.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who is playing the assistant card
      cardNumber - the index of the assistant card in the deck

    • checkLastPlayedAssistant

      public boolean checkLastPlayedAssistant(int order)
      Check which is the last cards played by the other player during the current round
      Parameters:
      order - is the order of the card.
      Returns:
      true if the card is the last card played.

    • playCharacterCard

      public boolean playCharacterCard(CharacterCardStrategy characterCard, int index, PawnColor color)
      Checks that the current player has enough coins to play the selected character card,
      Parameters:
      characterCard - character card to play
      index - island index to activate the effect on
      color - color selected for the card's effect

    • notifyAllClients

      public void notifyAllClients(String type, String message)
